item.title: How I Became a Digital Nomad?
item.description:
In 2015, I was on my way to graduate school in Germany. I made it as far as Amsterdam when I was unexpectedly hospitalized for 15 days. Unfortunately, the program began on the seventh day of my stay, and the German university would not allow a late start. My plans collapsed, and I had to return to the United States.

By then, we had already sold our house, so I needed to find a new place to live quickly. My requirements were clear: the location had to be inexpensive, have reliable high‚Äëspeed internet, be near a major international airport, and ‚Äî most importantly ‚Äî be somewhere warm, where ‚Äúsnow‚Äù was a foreign word and the only ice you encountered was in your drink.
